title: Revert to Version 6

requirements.text: Revert the entire project (frontend and backend) to the state it was in at Version 6, undoing all changes introduced in Versions 7 through 13.
acceptanceCriteria: All frontend files match the Version 6 snapshot exactly.
All backend files match the Version 6 snapshot exactly.
No code, styles, or logic from Versions 7–13 (including the z-index/overlay fixes and white background changes) remain in the codebase.

constraints: Do not retain any changes introduced after Version 6.
Immutable frontend paths (hooks, main.tsx, ui components) must remain untouched per platform rules.
nonGoals: Introducing any new features or fixes beyond restoring Version 6.
Partial rollbacks — the full revert to Version 6 is required.
